short_summary: Purchase of 1 item (NOSE GEAR HARNESS, WOW #2 - 1 quantity) for the Challenger CL604 Aircraft for Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD).
tags: Purchase of NOSE GEAR HARNESS, WOW #2--1 quantity
full_summary:
================

**Solicitation Notice: NOSE GEAR HARNESS (WOW #2) FOR CHALLENGER CL604 AIRCRAFT**
------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Solicitation Number:** T8493-230011/A

**Publication Date:** May 16, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** May 25, 2023 (14:00 EST)

**Agency:** Public Works and Government Services Canada

**Contact:** Valerie Bourassa, Supply Officer, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Phone: (873) 455-0980, Email: valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca

**Project Description:**
The Government of Canada, through Public Works and Government Services Canada, invites qualified Supply Arrangement Holders to submit a proposal for the acquisition of a NOSE GEAR HARNESS (WOW #2) for the Challenger CL604 aircraft, serial number 5535, tail number 618, operated by Transport Canada, Air Services Directorate.

**Background:**
This requirement is part of the Supply Arrangement (SA) T8493-140035 series, which aims to provide a comprehensive solution for the provision of aircraft parts and accessories. The successful bidder will be awarded a contract for the delivery of one (1) NOSE GEAR HARNESS (WOW #2).

**Eligibility:**
Only qualified Supply Arrangement Holders are eligible to participate in this solicitation. The list of eligible suppliers can be found in the solicitation documents.

**Submission Requirements:**
Prospective suppliers must submit their proposals electronically to Valerie Bourassa, Supply Officer, by the tender closing date. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the solicitation documents.

**Delivery:**
The delivery date for the NOSE GEAR HARNESS (WOW #2) is June 19, 2023.

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other relevant trade agreements.

**Instructions to Suppliers:**
A copy of this solicitation notice is also available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website. Suppliers must submit their proposals in one of
